transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Halo.
Halo.
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: Savere call kiya tha.
Executive: Aapke pass call kiya tha maine.
Customer: Haan Sahil bol raha hun Makrana se.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji boliye.
Customer: Awaaz aa rahi hai sir aapko.
Executive: Haan aa rahi hai aa rahi hai awaaz aa rahi hai.
Customer: Sir wo Tausif baat kar raha tha sir main Haryana se.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Ji ji. Sir ye aapko sunna ye wale number pe jo hai number save nahi hai. Number company ka naam bataiyega ek baar aap apne.
Executive: Samon Marble Supplier.
Customer: Samon Marble Supplier. Accha accha.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Aapka call aaya tha subah mere pass mein.
Customer: Subah. Accha accha maine call kiya tha aapko ek minute. Shadab ne kiya tha aapko jo aapka account manager hai na Shadab.
Executive: Haan Shadab Shadab Shadab.
Customer: Ji ji main uska manager baat kar raha hun. Unke main aapko Shadab se call karwa raha hun ek second.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know who called him.

Resolution:

- Executive is Shadab's manager.
- Executive will connect customer to Shadab.


Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call, account manager, company name
